#summary how to read floppy in rm, using bois interrupt 0x13

= Instruction details =

|| intr Nr: || registers || for ||
|| 0x13     || ah = 0x0  || reset ||
|| 0x13     || ah = 0x2  al <- read Nr sectors, dh <- Head Nr, dl<- drive Nr, ch <- cylinder Nr, cl <- beginning sector Nr, es:bx <- buffer || read from floopy to buffer ||
